channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- HT Mega
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- HT Mega

item.title: CVE-2024-32782|2024-04-24T07:52:19.918Z -- HasThemes -- HT Mega
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30182|2024-03-27T11:46:10.227Z -- HasThemes -- HT Mega
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.3.
